benchmark_details.name: ChineseMenuCSI
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce the ChineseMenuCSI dataset, the largest for Chinese-English menu corpora, annotated with CSI vs Non-CSI labels and a fine-grained test set. This dataset enables an in-depth analysis of CSI translation efficacy of LLMs and NMT systems.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve machine translation of culturally nuanced, figurative language in restaurant menus using a novel dataset and methodology.

data.source: Human-verified dish entries collected from restaurants in the UK.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on evaluation of translation outputs using COMET.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better translation performance, especially in capturing cultural nuances.
methodology.baseline_results: Google Translate, GPT-3.5, and GPT-4o used for comparative evaluation against the dataset.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through inter-annotator agreement and testing methods for reliability.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data collected from public restaurant websites with no private information.
